pages.about: About SelectioPraestans - Leading Personnel Recruitment Firm About us Departments Advantages Services Team Reviews FAQ Contact us Home About us Departments Advantages Services Team Reviews FAQ Contact us About Us SelectioPraestans is a leading recruitment agency dedicated to connecting businesses with exceptional talent. With over 15 years of experience in the industry, we specialize in providing tailored staffing solutions across various sectors including technology, finance, healthcare, and more. Our mission is to streamline the hiring process for our clients and help them achieve their business goals through strategic workforce planning and recruitment expertise. We are committed to delivering unparalleled service, ensuring each placement aligns perfectly with our clients' unique requirements. At SelectioPraestans, we prioritize integrity, professionalism, and client satisfaction. Our team of experienced recruiters leverages innovative sourcing techniques and a robust network to identify and secure top-tier candidates. Contact us Special Offers: Elevate Your Recruitment Strategy Tailored Recruitment Solutions Customized staffing strategies to fit your specific business needs. Global Recruitment Capabilities Expertise in international placements and cross-border talent acquisition. Rapid Staffing Solutions Quick and efficient staffing solutions for urgent hiring needs. Comprehensive Onboarding Support Assistance with the integration and onboarding process for new hires. Dynamic Pricing Solutions Standard Recruitment Package Our standard package offers essential recruitment services: Job profiling and candidate search Initial candidate screening Interview scheduling and coordination Reference checks Offer negotiation assistance 30-day guarantee on placements Contact Executive Recruitment Package Our executive package includes premium recruitment services: Executive search and headhunting Detailed candidate profiling Psychometric testing and assessment Executive interview panel coordination Negotiation of executive compensation packages 90-day guarantee on executive placements Contact Customized Recruitment Solutions Tailored solutions to meet your specific recruitment needs: Dedicated account manager Specialized recruitment campaigns Customized recruitment strategy development Flexible pricing and service options Industry-specific candidate sourcing Post-placement support and follow-up Contact Blog Exciting New Partnership Announced We are thrilled to announce our partnership with XYZ Corporation, enhancing our service capabilities and industry reach. This collaboration will allow us to offer even more robust recruitment solutions to our clients, leveraging XYZ Corporation's expertise in technology integration and global sourcing. Date: 30.06.2024 Company Expansion into New Markets We are excited to announce our expansion into the European market, marking a significant milestone for SelectioPraestans. This strategic move will enable us to better serve our European clients and tap into new talent pools, driving growth and innovation in recruitment strategies across the region. Date: 25.06.2024 Celebrating 10 Years of Excellence We are proud to celebrate a decade of delivering top-tier recruitment solutions to our valued clients worldwide. Over the past 10 years, SelectioPraestans has evolved into a trusted partner for businesses seeking exceptional talent and strategic workforce solutions. We look forward to continuing our journey of excellence and innovation in the years to come. Date: 20.06.2024 SelectioPraestans@gmail.com +919798789745 Lakkhnaau, Yuttar Pradesh, India Privacy Home About us Departments Advantages Services Team Reviews FAQ Contact us

We use a combination of direct sourcing, networking, and targeted advertising to find top talent. What types of positions do you recruit for? We recruit for permanent, temporary, and contract positions across all levels, from entry-level to executive. Can you handle international placements? Yes, we have experience and capability in handling international placements and global recruitment needs. What is your process for candidate assessment? Our process includes thorough interviews, skills assessments, reference checks, and cultural fit evaluations. How do I get started with SelectioPraestans? You can get started by contacting us directly through our website or by requesting a consultation with one of our recruitment specialists. pages.policy: SelectioPraestans Privacy Policy About us Departments Advantages Services Team Reviews FAQ Contact us Home About us Departments Advantages Services Team Reviews FAQ Contact us Privacy Policy - SelectioPraestans Introduction Welcome to SelectioPraestans's Privacy Policy. This document outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website or engage with our recruitment services. We are committed to safeguarding your privacy and ensuring transparency in how we handle your data. Information We Collect We collect various types of information from you when you interact with us, including personal data such as your name, contact information, resume/CV, employment history, and any other details you provide voluntarily. We may also collect non-personal information such as browser type, IP address, and cookies to enhance your browsing experience. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect to provide and improve our recruitment services, personalize your experience on our website, communicate with you about job opportunities, process your job applications, and comply with legal obligations. Your data may also be used for internal analytics and marketing purposes, where permitted by law. Data Security We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include encryption, access controls, and regular security assessments. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Sharing of Your Information We may share your personal information with trusted third parties, including our partners, service providers, and affiliates, for purposes such as job matching, background checks, or legal compliance. We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties for their marketing purposes without your explicit consent. Your Rights and Choices You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information stored by us. You can also choose to restrict the processing of your data or withdraw your consent for specific purposes where applicable. We respect your privacy preferences and will comply with your requests in accordance with applicable laws. Retention of Your Information We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. When we no longer need your information, we securely delete or anonymize it to prevent unauthorized access. Children's Privacy Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children without parental consent. If we become aware that we have inadvertently gathered information from children, we take steps to delete it as soon as possible. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website and updating the "Last Updated" date. We encourage you to review this policy regularly for updates. Data Transfer and International Operations Your personal information may be transferred to and processed in countries outside of your jurisdiction, where data protection laws may differ. We take appropriate measures to ensure that your data is protected in accordance with applicable laws and regulations, including implementing standard contractual clauses or obtaining your consent where necessary. Third-Party Links and Services Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not operated by us. These links are provided for your convenience and informational purposes only. We do not endorse or control these third-party websites and are not responsible for their privacy practices. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party websites before providing them with your personal information. Data Breach Notification In the event of a data breach that may compromise your personal information, we will notify you and relevant authorities as required by law. We take immediate action to investigate and mitigate any security incidents to protect your data and prevent future breaches. Contact If you have any questions, concerns, or complaints about our privacy practices or this policy, please contact our data protection officer at SelectioPraestans@gmail.com. You can also reach us by mail at or by phone . We take privacy seriously and will do our best to address any issues promptly and effectively. SelectioPraestans@gmail.com +919798789745 Lakkhnaau, Yuttar Pradesh, India Privacy Home About us Departments Advantages Services Team Reviews FAQ Contact us
